AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Spooky kid
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a relatively average home, with [PAWN_possessive] father working for the government. [PAWN_possessive] whole world changed one night, when [PAWN_possessive] sister was carried away by a strange light...

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Federal investigator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The mysterious disappearance of [PAWN_nameDef]'s sister and [PAWN_possessive] ensuing search for her became the consuming drive of [PAWN_possessive] life. [PAWN_pronoun] graduated from university with a degree in psychology, and joined the Federal Investigation service. After garnering some fame as an outstanding criminal psychologist and profiler, [PAWN_pronoun] discovered an obscure section dealing with a mass of strange unexplained and unsolved case files. [PAWN_pronoun] pored over these cases in [PAWN_possessive] spare time, becoming obsessed with them. Dana Scully, an instructor at the Academy's Forensic Science Research and Training Center, was partnered with [PAWN_objective] for the purpose of applying scientific reasoning to [PAWN_nameDef]'s work and theories.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Language student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to middle class parents in the south of a large island nation, and attended a minor public school and an antiquated college of little distinction, studying modern languages with a particular focus on Baroque German literature. While considering post-graduate study in that field, [PAWN_pronoun] was recruited into the Intelligence Agencies by [PAWN_possessive] tutor Jebedee.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Head of intelligence
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the head of intelligence after uncovering an enemy mole placed at the top ranks of the intelligence agency. After a long and costly 'secret war', [PAWN_pronoun] was able to turn [PAWN_possessive] opposite in the enemy's intelligence agency.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Young astrophysicist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: A young [PAWN_nameDef] was inspired by a visit to the World's Fair. Seeing all the amazing applications and explorations of science left a deep sense of awe and wonder at the mechanics of the universe. This started [PAWN_possessive] path to astronomy and astrophysics.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Astrophysics professor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Over time, [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for scientific discovery pushed [PAWN_objective] to write a multitude of books and other media devoted to astronomy and astrophysics. How did [PAWN_pronoun] end up here?...

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Soldier trainee
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent most of [PAWN_possessive] youth training in an elite military academy. Alongside scholastics, the academy has an extensive military training regimen. Many intelligence agents and brilliant tacticians are among it's graduates.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ninja tactician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] established a reputation as a brilliant tactician and formidable warrior after planning brilliant defenses against a large bandit clan, and performing several escorts and daring rescues of government officials.
